channel.title: Prob
channel.description:
http://uppit.com/jy2vln4g0zlp/201.rar
This is a 201 client, and 201 server, the server is stripped down completely (30kb) it only contains walking and chatting, also multiplayer.
I've added gameobjects, and gamewallobjects
Gameobjects work 100% Gamewallobjects (doors ect) is fucked, and I have no idea whats causing the problem, it seems only south facing door frames will load or actually, only some south facing will load, the rest don't, but sometimes when you walk around, close to door openings, door frames will randomly appear beside your character (not where they should be but close), and sometimes walls randomly appear, I think that's the update gamewallobjects packet, but yeah if someone could take the time to look over the server sauce it'd be much appreciated, it's only a 30kb src, in the download the gameobjects are blanked out not to load, but the wall objects are set to load. a few keywords to search for:
client_Handler.java -> update() method (right at the bottom of the file this is where gameobjects are blanked atm) load_gameWallObjects.java , load_gameObjects.java(idk maybe to compare)
server.java -> load_gameObjects.load_Definitions() (is blanked atm) load_gameWallObjects.load_Definitions()
and finially,
player.java -> append_Game_Objects() and append_game_wall_objects()
I really need the door frames working :\
Thanks.

item.title: Prob
item.dc:creator: @dimebagx dimebagx
item.description:
@dimebagx wrote:

http://uppit.com/jy2vln4g0zlp/201.rar

This is a 201 client, and 201 server, the server is stripped down completely (30kb) it only contains walking and chatting, also multiplayer.

I’ve added gameobjects, and gamewallobjects

Gameobjects work 100%
Gamewallobjects (doors ect) is fucked, and I have no idea whats causing the problem, it seems only south facing door frames will load or actually, only some south facing will load, the rest don’t, but sometimes when you walk around, close to door openings, door frames will randomly appear beside your character (not where they should be but close), and sometimes walls randomly appear, I think that’s the update gamewallobjects packet, but yeah if someone could take the time to look over the server sauce it’d be much appreciated, it’s only a 30kb src, in the download the gameobjects are blanked out not to load, but the wall objects are set to load. a few keywords to search for:

client_Handler.java -> update() method (right at the bottom of the file this is where gameobjects are blanked atm)
load_gameWallObjects.java , load_gameObjects.java(idk maybe to compare)

server.java -> load_gameObjects.load_Definitions() (is blanked atm)
load_gameWallObjects.load_Definitions()

and finially,

player.java -> append_Game_Objects()
and append_game_wall_objects()

I really need the door frames working :\

Thanks.
